Package com.openclassrooms.mddapi.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.openclassrooms.mddapi.controllers.UserController
@RestController public class UserController extends Object
This Controller handles User (for profile page) but also subscriptions, because they are Mapped in User entity

  • Method Details

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/api/user/{id}") public MessageResponse updateUser(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody UpdateUserRequest req)

    • getSubscriptions

      @GetMapping("/api/user/{id}/subscriptions") public List<Topic> getSubscriptions(@PathVariable("id") Long id)

    • subscribeToTopic

      @PostMapping("/api/user/{id}/subscribe/{topic_id}") public MessageResponse subscribeToTopic(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable("topic_id") Long topic_id)

    • unsubscribeToTopic

      @DeleteMapping("/api/user/{id}/unsubscribe/{topic_id}") public MessageResponse unsubscribeToTopic(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable("topic_id") Long topic_id)
